abstract: The fans in the Bronx on Sunday produced more lusty hoots to again remind Alex Rodriguez of his recent failures. After the first two games in the Yankees' American League division series, he was 0 for 8.
snippet: The fans in the Bronx on Sunday produced more lusty hoots to again remind Alex Rodriguez of his recent failures. After the first two games in the Yankees' American League division series, he was 0 for 8.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT - After the success he had two years ago leading the Yankees to the World Series title, Alex Rodriguez may have thought he had heard his final boos at Yankee Stadium.
